mutants.code:
def min_operations_to_triangular_blocks(N, blst):
    tri_nums = [i * (i + 1) // 2 for i in range(1500)]
    if sum(blst) in tri_nums:
        return -1
    end = [i + 1 for i in range(tri_nums.index(sum(blst)))]
    lenb = N
    cnt = 0
    while blst != end:
        if cnt > 10000:
            return -1
        blst = [i - 1 for i in blst if i > 1]
        blst.append(lenb)
        lenb = len(blst)
        cnt += 1
    return cnt
